author: Anonymous Mouse
title: START FILE 1 Problem2
question:
When I try to SPD handin my problem 2, it says my line is over 80 limit characters. But the format is supposed to be (shape width length "solid" "color"), and I am not sure how to fix that.
Here is my line
(beside (rectangle 1 1 "solid" "red")(rectangle 2 1 "solid" "white")(rectangle 1 1 "solid" "red"))
Can someone please help me.
student_answer:
You should start a new line after the first rectangle
(beside (rectangle 1 1 "solid" "red")
 (rectangle 2 1 "solid""white")
and so on
